name: abap-integration-test-openapi
description: Integration testing ABAP OpenAPI REST call on GitHub Actions

scripts.database:schema: sleep 5 && cat backend/schema.sql | docker exec -i abap-integration-test-openapi-postgresql-1 psql -h localhost -U postgres
scripts.docker:start: docker compose -p abap-integration-test-openapi -f backend/stack.yml up -d && npm run database:schema
scripts.test: abaplint && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node output/index.mjs
